function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of auditing and design evaluation of BACS in smart buildings leading to large energy performance gaps and suboptimal control systems.","Impact":"Buildings not meeting design requirements and systems drifting from initial design standards, potentially contributing to energy inefficiency and increased risk of contagion propagation.","Mitigation":"Implement thorough auditing and design evaluation of BACS in smart buildings to ensure optimal control systems and energy performance.","Technologies":"Building automation and control system (BACS) auditing tools, smart meters, energy performance monitoring technology.","People":"Building owners, facility managers, building automation and control system (BACS) designers, energy efficiency experts.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, building automation and control system (BACS) designers, energy efficiency experts."}]}
